meaningMnemonic: The <radical>sun</radical> rises from the <radical>ground</radical>, and on top of it is a giant <radical>shrimp</radical>. It doesn't do anything except for every day right at <kanji>noon</kanji>, when it tells you the time. "Hey guyz, it's <kanji>noon</kanji>, mmk?"
readingMnemonic: At <kanji>noon</kanji>, the shrimp also puts on its high <reading>heel</reading>s (ひる) to get ready for the evening, where it wants to make sure it looks good for the other shrimp he/she meets later on.
